# 欺骗的艺术

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qipian-de-yishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qipian-de-yishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qipian-de-yishu
qipian-de-yishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qipian-de-yishu
qipian-de-yishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
